mapper.select: SELECT a.order_num orderNum FROM sys_eve_menu a WHERE a.menu_parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.order_num DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.menu_name menuName, a.menu_level menuLevel, IFNULL(k.desktop_name, '默认桌面') desktopName FROM sys_eve_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_desktop k ON k.id = a.desktop_id
,sys_eve_menu b
WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.menu_parent_id, ','), CONCAT(',', #{parentId}, ','))
AND b.id = #{parentId} AND (b.menu_level + 1) = a.menu_level
ORDER BY a.order_num ASC

SELECT a.id, a.menu_name menuName, a.icon icon, a.icon_color iconColor, a.icon_bg iconBg, a.icon_type iconType, a.icon_pic iconPic, a.menu_name_en menuNameEn, a.menu_level menuLevel, a.menu_type menuType, a.menu_sys_type menuSysType, a.menu_parent_id parentId, a.menu_url menuUrl, a.sys_win_id sysWinId, a.desktop_id desktopId, a.is_share isShare FROM sys_eve_menu a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) roleNum FROM sys_eve_role_menu d WHERE d.menu_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_eve_menu WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', menu_parent_id, ','), CONCAT(',', #{id}, ','))
mapper.select: SELECT a.menu_level id, CASE a.menu_level WHEN '0' THEN '创世菜单' ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(a.menu_level, char), '级子菜单') END name FROM sys_eve_menu a GROUP BY a.menu_level

SELECT b.id, b.order_num orderNum, a.order_num thisOrderNum FROM sys_eve_menu a, sys_eve_menu b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.menu_parent_id = a.menu_parent_id AND a.order_num > b.order_num ORDER BY b.order_num DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT b.id, b.order_num orderNum, a.order_num thisOrderNum FROM sys_eve_menu a, sys_eve_menu b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.menu_parent_id = a.menu_parent_id AND b.order_num > a.order_num ORDER BY b.order_num DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.menu_name menuName, CASE a.icon_type WHEN '1' THEN a.icon WHEN '2' THEN a.icon_pic END menuIcon, a.icon_color menuIconColor, a.icon_bg menuIconBg, a.icon_type menuIconType, a.icon_pic menuIconPic, a.menu_name_en menuNameEn, a.menu_level menuLevel, a.menu_type menuType, CASE a.menu_sys_type WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '2' THEN '否' ELSE '参数错误' END menuSysType, a.menu_parent_id parentId, a.menu_url menuUrl, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, b.user_name userName, CASE a.desktop_id WHEN 'winfixedpage00000000' THEN '默认桌面' ELSE d.desktop_name END desktopName, a.order_num orderNum, CASE a.is_share WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '参数错误' END isShare, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(c.menu_name separator '->'), '创世菜单') menuParentName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_role_menu d WHERE d.menu_id = a.id) roleNum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_menu_auth_point e WHERE e.menu_id = a.id) authpointNum FROM sys_eve_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_menu c ON INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.menu_parent_id, ','), CONCAT(',', c.id, ',')) LEFT JOIN sys_eve_desktop d ON a.desktop_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
